titulo: El Demonia Vestido de Azul [Devil in a Blue Dress] (Texto Completo)
descripcion: Easy Rawlins has few illusions about the world, at least not about the world of a young black veteran in the late 1940s in Southern California. Fired from his job on the line at an aircraft plant, he accepts a white man's offer to pay him for finding a beautiful, mysterious Frenchwoman.
